rooms.name: Entrance Lobby & Living Area
rooms.description: This area is designed to provide a warm welcome and easy transition into the home. It includes a foyer leading directly into an open living space with modern furnishings, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning entrances in the North-East direction for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, this dining space offers ample seating and a view of the garden. The positioning ensures positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern industrial kitchen designed for efficiency with ample storage and a central island, oriented towards the East following Vastu guidelines for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: This is the primary bedroom designed as a bachelor pad with a spacious balcony, ensuring plenty of natural light and ventilation. The balcony enhances relaxation, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning it on the South-West side.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace that doubles as a study area, strategically placed for maximum natural light and minimal distractions. It is positioned according to Vastu principles for mental clarity.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance designed with industrial aesthetics and Vastu-compliant placement in the North-East direction to invite prosperity.

openings.name: Balcony Outlets
openings.description: Each bedroom, especially the master, features an attached balcony that overlooks either a large garden or industrial landscape, providing serene views and outdoor relaxation.
